pageTitle: Compare Google Apps billing plans - Google Apps Administrator Help
textBeforeTable: Compare plans at a glance When you set up billing for Google Apps, you can choose between two billing plans: Note: The Annual Plan is currently unavailable if you choose certain countries when you purchase Google Apps. Existing customers on an Annual Plan will remain unaffected. Compare Google Apps billing plans Billing plans Help }]);})(); Contact us Google Apps Administrator Help
textAfterTable: Flexible Plan You're billed monthly for each user account. You can add and remove accounts at any time and pay only for the accounts you use during that month. You can cancel service at any time without penalty. Recommended for: Small organizations with a variable size workforce. Annual Plan You're billed monthly at a discounted rate. To earn the discount, you commit to paying a full year's subscription for your team or company. If your team grows, you can purchase more licenses and your monthly rate goes up. You can reduce licenses or monthly payments only when renewing your plan at the end of the year. If you cancel your subscription before the year is up, you still pay for the full year. Recommended for: Organizations with a constant or growing workforce. The Annual Plan isn't available when purchasing Google Apps Unlimited online. For more plan options, Apps Unlimited customers can contact a Google Sales representative or local reseller. Questions What are rates in other currencies? Google Apps for Work Learn more about Google Apps for Work.   Flexible Plan Annual Plan Contract None 1 year (billed monthly) Price per user USD $5 / month $50 / year EUR €4 / month
